meanings.definition: Give new life or vigor to
meanings.sent1: A good night's sleep revitalizes your body and mind.
meanings.sent2: Exercise revitalizes your energy levels after a long day.
meanings.sent3: The cup of coffee revitalizes the sleepy student in the morning.
meanings.sent4: Laughter revitalizes the spirit like a burst of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: Music has the power to revitalize your mood instantly.

meanings.definition: Make something active or lively again
meanings.sent1: Opening the windows revitalizes the stuffy room.
meanings.sent2: Playing with friends revitalizes the old toy.
meanings.sent3: The dance party revitalizes the quiet neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The rain revitalizes the dry earth, bringing new growth.
meanings.sent5: A walk in nature can revitalize your senses and clear your mind.
